full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ZHABS BRTAN GSOL 'DEBS DGE LEGS KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DZA SAG THU HAN AAS MAG RGYAL KHANG RTZE'I DGON PA RAB BRTAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING GI MCHOG SPRUL AE RTE NI PAndI TA HO THOG THU RTA MGRIN BADZRA GYI ZHABS BRTAN GSOL 'DEBS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES, AE RTE NI PHYAG MDZOD PA NO MON, ,HANG AA K'O LA'I CHI K'O LA KANG NI T'A WANG 'OD ZER BADZRA, RGYAL KHANG RTZE HO THOG THU PHYAG MDZOD PA GRAGS PA RDO RJE, GSOL DPON DGON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN, WANG KHAS KHAMS TSAN GYI BLA MA, DGE SGOS DANG, DGE SGOS DGE 'PHEL, ,THU SA LA HO THU SHE MEL SNA TSOGS @003B RTEN 'BREL, ,ME'I RING RDZANG GI THU ZA THAS SOGS SER SKYA THUN MONG NS MAndAL SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN DANG BCAS BSKUL MA MDZAD PA'I NGOR KHU RAL MKHAN PO NO MON HANG SHING THUNG AER TE NI AU HAN PAndI TA DGON GSAR SKYE MING 'DZIN PA BKA' CHEN BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN CHOS 'PHEL LAM MING GZHAN BYANG CHUB DON YOD RGYAL MTSAN GYIS RAB GUS DVANG PA CHEN POS SBYAR BA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
